system.descriptor: Determine the Value of an object or group of items. Difficult varies with user's access to the item, time allowed for evaluation, etc. Can also determine requirements for Endeavours.
system.uses:
Skill Test: Determine value of a single item, more DoS means more information given about object, more DoF means miscalculation of value.
Extended Skill Test: Determine value of large cargos of items, same as previous.
 Note: Test rolled by GM, who gives the information the user thinks they know, whether it is correct or not.

description.value: Determine the Value of an object or group of items. Difficult varies with user's access to the item, time allowed for evaluation, etc. Can also determine requirements for Endeavours.
